mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SUBJECT (SUB_NUM, SUB_TITLE, SUB_CONTENT, SUB_COD_CODE, SUB_REGDATE,SUB_REG_ID, SUB_REG_CODE, SUB_STATUS) VALUES (TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyyMMdd')||'SUB'||SUB_SEQ.NEXTVAL,#{sub_title},#{sub_content}, #{sub_cod_code},SYSDATE,#{sub_reg_id}, 'REG'||SUB_REG_SEQ.NEXTVAL,'W')
INSERT INTO SUB_REGISTER(REG_CODE, REG_AUTH ,REG_ID) VALUES((SELECT MAX(SUB_REG_CODE) FROM SUBJECT),#{reg_auth},#{reg_id})

SELECT MAX(SUB_NUM) FROM (SELECT SUB_NUM FROM SUBJECT ORDER BY SUB_REGDATE DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
INSERT INTO SUB_CURRICULUM(CUR_NUM,CUR_SUB_NUM,CUR_DETAIL, CUR_SUBCONTENT,CUR_VERSION,CUR_TIME, CUR_LEVEL,CUR_FILE) VALUES('CUR'||SUB_CUR_SEQ.NEXTVAL,#{sub_num}, #{cur_detail},#{cur_subcontent},#{cur_version}, #{cur_time},#{cur_level},#{cur_file})
mapper.select:
SELECT RN, SUB_NUM, SUB_TITLE,SUB_REGDATE, SUB_REG_ID , SUB_INS , SUB_STATUS,COD_NAME FROM ( SELECT RN, SUB_NUM, CASE WHEN LENGTH(SUB_TITLE) > 25 THEN SUBSTR(SUB_TITLE,0,25)|| '...' ELSE SUB_TITLE END SUB_TITLE, SUB_REGDATE, SUB_REG_ID , SUB_INS , SUB_STATUS, SUB_COD_CODE FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER () OVER(ORDER BY SUB_REGDATE DESC) RN, s.SUB_NUM , s.SUB_TITLE , s.SUB_REGDATE, s.SUB_REG_ID , s.SUB_INS , s.SUB_STATUS, s.SUB_COD_CODE FROM SUBJECT s
) WHERE RN BETWEEN 1 AND 15 ORDER BY SUB_REGDATE DESC ) T1 JOIN SUB_CODE T2 ON T1.SUB_COD_CODE=T2.COD_CODE

SELECT SUB_NUM, SUB_TITLE, SUB_CONTENT, SUB_TAG, sc2.COD_TAG , SUB_REG_ID , SUB_INS , SUB_REGDATE , SUB_SCORE , SUB_STATUS , SUB_REJECTION , sc.CUR_DETAIL , sc.CUR_SUBCONTENT , sc.CUR_VERSION , sc.CUR_TIME , sc.CUR_LEVEL , sc.CUR_FILE , sc2.COD_NAME FROM SUBJECT s JOIN SUB_CURRICULUM sc ON s.SUB_NUM = sc.CUR_SUB_NUM JOIN SUB_CODE sc2 ON s.SUB_COD_CODE = sc2.COD_CODE WHERE SUB_NUM = #{sub_num}

SELECT SUB_NUM, SUB_TITLE, CASE WHEN LENGTH(SUB_CONTENT) > 80 THEN SUBSTR(SUB_CONTENT,0,80) || '...' ELSE SUB_CONTENT END SUB_CONTENT , sc.COD_NAME, SUB_REGDATE, SUB_REG_ID, SUB_INS FROM SUBJECT s, SUB_CODE sc WHERE s.SUB_COD_CODE = sc.COD_CODE ORDER BY SUB_REGDATE DESC

SELECT SUB_NUM, SUB_TITLE, SUB_CONTENT , SUB_TAG||sc2.COD_TAG AS HASHTAG , SUB_COD_CODE , SUB_REGDATE , SUB_REG_ID , SUB_INS , sc2.COD_NAME, sc.CUR_DETAIL ,sc.CUR_SUBCONTENT ,sc.CUR_VERSION , sc.CUR_TIME ,sc.CUR_LEVEL ,sc.CUR_FILE FROM SUBJECT s INNER JOIN SUB_CURRICULUM sc ON s.SUB_NUM = sc.CUR_SUB_NUM INNER JOIN SUB_CODE sc2 ON s.SUB_COD_CODE = sc2.COD_CODE WHERE SUB_NUM=#{sub_num}
